name: Focus Aromatherapy Mood Scent
description:
Introducing Focus Mood Scent – Your Gateway to Enhanced Productivity and Creative Flow.

Crafted with care, Focus Mood Scent is designed to refresh your senses and elevate your mental clarity. Our thoughtfully blended therapeutic scents not only hydrate the atmosphere but also invigorate your mind, helping you achieve peak concentration, improve memory, and extend your attention span.

Key Aromatic Notes:
Mind-Enhancing Base: A bright, refreshing fusion of rosemary, sage, and spearmint stimulates cognitive functions, sharpening your focus.
Mood Uplifters: The zesty citrus burst from grapefruit, lemon, and orange energizes your spirit, promoting creativity and a positive mindset.
Grounding Elements: Earthy undertones of frankincense, cypress, and sage provide calming, stress-relieving benefits, anchoring you in the present moment.

Sensory Experience:
Smells Like: Minty, spicy, and earthy notes intertwine.
Feels Like: Entering a creative state where ideas flow effortlessly and time seems to fly.

Focus Ritual:
When productivity calls, shake well to activate the essential oils.
Mist gently over your face, body, or around your workspace to create an environment primed for focus.

Botanical Scents: Basil, Cypress, Eucalyptus, Frankincense, Grapefruit, Lavender, Lemon, Orange, Peppermint, Rosemary, Sage, Spearmint.

Other Ingredients: Purified Water, Witch Hazel – for a hydrating and refreshing mist.

Volume: 3.3 fl oz.

Hydrate your space, invigorate your mind, and dive into your most productive self with Focus Mood Scent.
